title: Go High Level Master + Social Media VA (Golf Brand)
job_overview:
Go High Level Master + Social Media VA (Golf Brand)

What We’re Looking For:

A tech-savvy, creative, self-starting Go High Level expert and Social Media VA who thrives on taking ownership of systems, automation, and making a brand look amazing online. You must understand English humour, golf lingo is a bonus, and initiative is essential.

About Big Swing Kings:

We’re Big Swing Kings – an online golf coaching brand built around fun, community, and swing breakthroughs. We help golfers "Golf Better Together" through online courses, 1:1 coaching, hilarious content, and seriously helpful swing advice. Our tone is cheeky, our methods are proven, and our goal is to help people love golf more.

 Ideal Skills & Experience:
Go High Level (Primary Focus):

- Advanced experience in Go High Level — you live for the back end, not just the drag-and-drop front end
- Can build and optimize full funnels, landing pages, lead magnets, opt-ins, and tripwires
- Skilled at creating automations, smart workflows, tags, custom fields, and triggers
- Confident setting up and connecting products, upsells, payment links, and course access
- Can manage and build out email sequences, broadcasts, and lead nurturing automations
- Able to track leads, build pipelines, and set up dashboards to monitor funnel and campaign performance
- Understands how to segment audiences, clean up inactive leads, and drive re-engagement
- Can integrate Go High Level with Instagram DMs, ManyChat, and third-party tools
- Connect with affiliate tracking and campaign performance tools
- A/B testing where needed
- Knows how to organize the system for clarity and performance — build it once, make it work forever

Social Media Management (Secondary Focus):

- We’re looking for someone to own both strategy and execution — if you’re experienced in content strategy and love getting hands-on with Canva, captions, and scheduling, this role is for you.
- Familiarity with Canva and tools like CapCut, Shot Tracer Pro to create content from existing media and design posts, carousels, and IG story templates
- Repurpose existing videos, screenshots, and content into social posts
- Schedule and post daily content to Instagram and Facebook (and possibly TikTok/YouTube)
- Craft engaging Hooks and captions with our brand voice (fun, cheeky, clear)
- Create simple IG highlight covers and organize the IG feed
- Suggest fun content ideas from our media vault or trends

+ Additional Skills & Bonus Experience:

- Excellent written English and ability to match brand voice
- Understanding of golf culture, golf humor, and coaching brands (or a fast learner!)
- Proactive, organized, and independent — takes initiative and gets things done
- Bonus: Experience with Skillest, affiliate marketing, 

Why You’ll Love Working With Us:

- You’ll help grow a fun and impactful golf brand that’s gaining traction fast
- You’ll have creative freedom and the opportunity to contribute big ideas
- We love a business that runs smoothly and efficiently — and we deeply value the kind of person who makes that happen behind the scenes.
- We’re flexible, travel-loving, and build in fun whenever possible
- Long-term opportunity for growth into a larger role

To Apply:
 
Email Upgrade to see actual info with:
- Subject: "GHL + Social Media Wizard – [Your Name]"
- A quick intro about yourself and your favorite golf joke (yes, really ????)
- Your resume or portfolio
- Links to any work you’ve done in Go High Level or Canva
- Bonus: Show us one fun idea you’d create for our IG
